preambule.title: Preamble
preambule.text1: These Terms and Conditions (hereinafter "Terms") govern the use of the Real Estate Referrer platform and the real estate referral program operated by Karyne de Clercq, licensed real estate agent in Dubai, UAE.
preambule.text2: By registering on the platform, you accept these Terms without reservation.

referrer.label: Referrer:
referrer.text: Any individual registered on the platform for the purpose of referring potential clients.

lead.label: Qualified Lead:
lead.text: Contact of a potential client genuinely interested in a real estate purchase or rental, with a defined budget and short-term project (0-6 months).
lead.consent: The lead must have given explicit consent to be contacted by the agent.

commission.label: Commission:
commission.text: Compensation paid to the referrer upon completion of a real estate transaction initiated by their lead.

agent.label: Agent:
agent.text: Karyne de Clercq, licensed RERA real estate agent in Dubai.

platform.label: Platform:
platform.text: The Real Estate Referrer website and application accessible at

eligibility.title: 2.1. Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.intro: To become a referrer, you must:
items: Be of legal age (minimum 18 years old)

validation.title: 2.2. Account Validation
validation.text: Your registration will be validated after verification of your information. We reserve the right to refuse any registration without justification.

responsibilities.title: 2.3. Responsibilities
responsibilities.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and all activities performed from your account.

functioning.title: 3.1. How It Works
functioning.intro: The program operates according to the following steps:
steps: The referrer identifies a potential client
The referrer submits the lead via the platform
The agent contacts the client and manages the transaction
In case of sale or rental, the referrer receives their commission

qualification.title: 3.2. Qualification Criteria
qualification.intro: A lead is considered qualified if it meets the following criteria:
items: Explicit consent: The person has authorized the sharing of their contact information
Genuine and current interest in a purchase or rental
The client is not already in contact with the agent
qualification.note: You are NOT authorized to conduct property viewings. Only agents with RERA licenses can do so. Your role is limited to transmitting client information.

rate.title: 4.1. Commission Rate
rate.text2: of the agent commission on any completed transaction.

payment.title: 4.2. Payment Terms
payment.text: Commissions are paid within 45 to 60 days after the final signing of the sale or rental contract and receipt of commission by the agent.

method.title: 4.3. Payment Method
method.text: Payments are made by bank transfer to the bank account you have provided in your profile.

nonPayment.title: 4.4. Non-Payment Conditions
nonPayment.intro: No commission is due in the following cases:
items: Lack of consent: The client had not authorized the sharing of their contact information
Client already in contact with the agent
Duplicate lead (already submitted by another referrer)

rera.title: 5.1. Compliance with RERA Laws
rera.intro: You agree to comply with all regulations of the Real Estate Regulatory Agency (RERA) of Dubai, including:
items: Formal prohibition of conducting property viewings
Prohibition of direct negotiation with property owners
Prohibition of representing the agent without written authorization

confidentiality.title: 5.2. Confidentiality
confidentiality.text: You agree not to disclose confidential information concerning the agent, their clients, or properties.

exclusivity.title: 5.3. Lead Exclusivity
exclusivity.text: Each submitted lead must be exclusive. You cannot submit the same lead to multiple agents or agencies simultaneously.

accuracy.title: 5.4. Information Accuracy
accuracy.text: You guarantee the accuracy and truthfulness of all information you provide regarding leads.

consent.title: 5.5. Mandatory Consent (GDPR)
consent.intro: You agree to obtain explicit and prior consent from each person before sharing their personal data.
items: The person must be informed that their contact information will be transmitted to a real estate agent
The person must explicitly agree to be contacted
You CANNOT share a person's contact information without their consent
consent.warning: ⚠️ Non-compliance with this obligation may result in immediate account suspension and legal action.

followUp.title: 6.1. Lead Follow-up
followUp.text: The agent commits to contact each qualified lead within a reasonable timeframe (48-72h) and ensure professional follow-up.

transparency.title: 6.2. Transparency
transparency.text: The agent commits to keep the referrer informed of each lead's progress via the platform (statuses: new, viewing, offer, sold).

commissionPayment.title: 6.3. Commission Payment
commissionPayment.text: The agent commits to pay due commissions within the stipulated timeframe (45-60 days after signing).

section7.text2: You have a personal, non-exclusive, and non-transferable right to use the platform, solely within the framework of the referral program.
section7.text3: Any reproduction, representation, modification, or exploitation of all or part of the platform is strictly prohibited without prior written authorization.

byReferrer.title: 8.1. Termination by Referrer
byReferrer.text: You may terminate your account at any time from your dashboard or by contacting support. Commissions on ongoing leads remain vested.

byAgent.title: 8.2. Termination by Agent
byAgent.intro: The agent reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of:

effects.title: 8.3. Effects of Termination
effects.text: In case of termination, you retain the right to commissions on already completed transactions. Ongoing leads are transferred to the agent without commission rights unless otherwise agreed.

limitations.title: 9.1. Liability Limitations
limitations.intro: The agent cannot be held liable for:
items: Non-completion of a transaction with a lead
Data loss due to force majeure
Actions or behaviors of referred clients

exclusions.title: 9.2. Warranty Exclusions
exclusions.text: The platform is provided "as is". The agent does not guarantee that the platform will be error-free or operate without interruption.

collection.title: 10.1. Data Collection
leadsItems: Name, email, phone of potential clients
Information about their real estate project
collection.note: Lead data can ONLY be collected if the person concerned has given explicit consent to be contacted by the real estate agent.

rights.title: 10.3. User Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right of access to your data
Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")

section11.text1: These Terms are governed by the law of the United Arab Emirates and the regulations of the RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Agency) of Dubai.
section11.text2: Any dispute relating to the interpretation or execution of these Terms falls under the exclusive jurisdiction of the Dubai courts.

section12.title: 12. Terms Modifications
section12.text1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Modifications take effect upon publication on the platform.
section12.text2: You will be notified by email of any substantial modification. Continued use of the platform after modification constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
